resources.string: 1. A special service for overseas customers
You can avoid any linguistic or cultural barriers by choosing a service company that has natural linguistic and cultural competencies.

While you want more than a certain level of service, it is difficult to verify each one since there are so many sources of information. We have curated only places that can provide foreigners with a certain level of service, regardless of the cost.
An affiliated place will offer you favorable costs, reservations, and service. Receiving special treatment in a verified location will enhance the quality of the entire trip.

1.Are all the places you recommend able to communicate in English?
2. Are there any benefits if I go through VIP KOREA?
5. How to create a custom packaging experience?

Yes, that\'s right. Basically, we recommend places where you can communicate in English. Other languages are also available at some vendors. Even if they are not fluent in the language, they know how to communicate with foreigners.

All places do not have a set of benefits, but we are trying to increase the benefits gradually. When you visit these places, if you tell them that you came through VIP KOREA, you will be able to get a little more management.
Of course it\'s possible. If you have experienced a service at a places in Korea you would recommend, please let us know. We will recommend it in our app and promote it to be affiliated.

As of now, we are planning a package service that will allow you to experience satisfactory service evenly while increasing the number of affiliates. We will provide meals, beauty treatments, lodging, entertainment, and treatment services.
Many elements must work in tandem when creating a well-designed branded packaging and unboxing experience, but you donâ€™t have to include every available option.
